name: Quick Korean Flavored Barbecue Sauce
description: A mere few minutes of work and minimal ingredients can turn a rather ho-hum bottled barbecue sauce into serious eats.
recipeIngredient: 18 ounces bottled barbecue sauce (1 1/2 cups), preferably KC Masterpiece

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, whisk together barbecue sauce, soy sauce, vinegar, ssamjang, gochujang, fish sauce, and sesame oil. Use immediately or pour back in bottle and store in refrigerator for up to a month.
